abstract: Senator Charles E. Grassley on Friday joined with dozens of academic researchers, consumer groups and journalism organizations in protesting a decision to pull off the Web a database of doctor malpractice and disciplinary cases.
snippet: Senator Charles E. Grassley on Friday joined with dozens of academic researchers, consumer groups and journalism organizations in protesting a decision to pull off the Web a database of doctor malpractice and disciplinary cases.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Grassley on Friday joined with dozens of academic researchers, consumer groups and journalism organizations who have protested an Obama administration decision to pull off the Web a database of doctor malpractice and disciplinary cases.

headline.main: Senator Protests Agency Decision to Remove Doctor Data Online
